attributes.action: Pay rise for ALL health workers and nurses
attributes.additional_details: Nurses, midwives, and other healthcare workers in the U.K. have worked selflessly and tirelessly in demanding and dangerous conditions. Spending weeks on end clapping to show thanks for ALL health workers on a Thursday evening was a nice gesture, but clearly an empty one if they are now being denied a reward for the same hard work that doctors and dentists have put in.
attributes.background: The government has recently announced that all nhs doctors and dentists will receive a pay rise, due to their efforts fighting the COVID-19 outbreak. They also stated this does not apply to nurses and other healthcare workers who have worked tirelessly to fight the same outbreak and deserve one too
